content: Super small. Didn’t realize just how small it would be but works great!

This foundation is amazing, it gives me a flawless, glowy, healthy finish. I have been trying to find a foundation that works for me, I believe this is it, I wish I would have found it sooner! If I don't feel like going dewy I apply a little coty airspun loose powder on top, and it's the best combo. I have dry to normal skin with some red spots on my cheeks, it covers it!
This goes on like silk - have older dryer skin and it just slides on so nicely and leaves a flawless look

I have normal to dry skin and hyperpigmentaion. This foundation is medium coverage. What I like the most is how natural this looks on the skin. It does not settle into any fine lines and does not emphasize dryness. I wish the lasting power was better (4 hrs).

Received a sample of this foundation and was pleasantly shocked to find the color was a perfect match and the finish was silky smooth. Although this seems to be a highly pigmented foundation, the coverage is medium rather than full. Buildable? Yes, however using a single application with a good spot concealer will provide an incredibly natural, seemingly flawless finish. Purchased the mini size to see me through the winter months and will probably find a slightly warmer shade for the summer months.

I have combination skin and minimal acne. This foundation has the perfect amount of coverage, as I am in high school and don’t need heavier makeup. I wouldn’t recommend if you have severe acne or a lot of blemishes, as this product is a more sheer finish. It is a GORGEOUS foundation that is super light on the skin and is perfect for me!
title: pretty good
My new Holy Grail foundation
The Best of the Best
medium coverage
Produces a lovely, natural look!
great for those looking for minimal sheer coverage
